an8.39:1.1: “Atthime, bhikkhave, punnabhisanda kusalabhisanda sukhassahara sovaggika sukhavipaka saggasamvattanika, itthaya kantaya manapaya hitaya sukhaya samvattanti.
an8.39:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasavako buddham saranam gato hoti.
an8.39:1.4: Ayam, bhikkhave, pathamo punnabhisando kusalabhisando sukhassaharo sovaggiko sukhavipako saggasamvattaniko, itthaya kantaya manapaya hitaya sukhaya samvattati.
an8.39:2.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, ariyasavako dhammam saranam gato hoti.
an8.39:3.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, ariyasavako sangham saranam gato hoti.
an8.39:3.2: Ayam, bhikkhave, tatiyo punnabhisando kusalabhisando sukhassaharo sovaggiko sukhavipako saggasamvattaniko, itthaya kantaya manapaya hitaya sukhaya samvattati.
an8.39:3.3: Pancimani, bhikkhave, danani mahadanani aggannani rattannani vamsannani poranani asankinnani asankinnapubbani, na sankiyanti na sankiyissanti, appatikutthani samanehi brahmanehi vinnuhi.
an8.39:3.5: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasavako panatipatam pahaya panatipata pativirato hoti.
an8.39:3.6: Panatipata pativirato, bhikkhave, ariyasavako aparimananam sattanam abhayam deti, averam deti, abyabajjham deti.
an8.39:3.7: Aparimananam sattanam abhayam datva averam datva abyabajjham datva aparimanassa abhayassa averassa abyabajjhassa bhagi hoti.
an8.39:3.8: Idam, bhikkhave, pathamam danam mahadanam aggannam rattannam vamsannam poranam asankinnam asankinnapubbam, na sankiyati na sankiyissati, appatikuttham samanehi brahmanehi vinnuhi.
an8.39:3.9: Ayam, bhikkhave, catuttho punnabhisando kusalabhisando sukhassaharo sovaggiko sukhavipako saggasamvattaniko, itthaya kantaya manapaya hitaya sukhaya samvattati.
an8.39:4.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, ariyasavako adinnadanam pahaya adinnadana pativirato hoti
an8.39:7.2: Suramerayamajjapamadatthana pativirato, bhikkhave, ariyasavako aparimananam sattanam abhayam deti averam deti abyabajjham deti.
an8.39:7.3: Aparimananam sattanam abhayam datva averam datva abyabajjham datva, aparimanassa abhayassa averassa abyabajjhassa bhagi hoti.
an8.39:7.4: Idam, bhikkhave, pancamam danam mahadanam aggannam rattannam vamsannam poranam asankinnam asankinnapubbam, na sankiyati na sankiyissati, appatikuttham samanehi brahmanehi vinnuhi.
an8.39:7.5: Ayam kho, bhikkhave, atthamo punnabhisando kusalabhisando sukhassaharo sovaggiko sukhavipako saggasamvattaniko, itthaya kantaya manapaya hitaya sukhaya samvattati.
an8.39:8.1: Ime kho, bhikkhave, attha punnabhisanda kusalabhisanda sukhassahara sovaggika sukhavipaka saggasamvattanika, itthaya kantaya manapaya hitaya sukhaya samvattanti”ti.
